synopsis.text: Yukami Makoto, a high school student with a passion for hot springs, finds himself at the enchanting Miyama-kan inn, marking his 100th hot spring visit. Run by four charming girls - Tokura, Akino, Tsutsuji, and Mitomo - the inn also houses a secret: Yuri, the captivating goddess of hot springs. Makoto inadvertently witnesses Yuri using her divine powers and unintentionally takes them over. As a result, he finds himself working at the inn, surrounded by the allure of the hot springs and the intriguing company of the five girls. Could this be the beginning of a romantic adventure?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
